title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: Currently, when a table report item is added without setting the dataset and a user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not displayed.
EB: The expected behavior is that the group dialog should be shown even if the dataset is not defined. Users should be able to define a group, regardless of whether the dataset is set or not.
SR:
To reproduce the issue, follow these steps:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try creating a new table group.
3. Verify that the group dialog is shown, allowing the user to define the group.
